p: The compounds aromadendr-1(10)-en-9-one ( 281) and cadina-4,10(15)-dien-3-dione ( 282) were obtained only from the essential oil of Condea verticillata (syn. Hyptis verticillata), being its major components (ca. 30% and 15%, respectively) ( Facey et al., 2005). Borneol ( 251) and elemol ( 285) were the principal components in the oil from Condea emoryi (syn. Hyptis emoryi) ( Tanowitz et al., 1984).
